abstract: 'The language, the customs and the strange noises...'
description: When Dave Piggott went to fight in the Vietnam War at 19, it was a very different world to life back in Australia. With the help of the friends he made in the army, he soon got used to life there and it's the funny stories and good friends that remain with him today.
